messages.message:
hey team - fyi, there are a large number of deployment and build failures that are ongoing over the past many hours today. This is due to an expired cert in fetching `go-opencensus`, from the source `go.opencensus.io (http://go.opencensus.io)`.

There have been few fixes attempted today. Some of the earlier ones could not cover everything as this dependency is present through not only our direct usage, but also via other libs, and 3rd party services.

Currently the last fix being (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C089BRTSVSA/p1737471092822209?thread_ts=1737463335.061219&cid=C089BRTSVSA) tested by the team is aiming to point to github mirror for fetching this lib, and testing that it covers all the builds.

For the latest, please feel free to check <#C089BRTSVSA|>
